name: Squares - Don't trust your eyes
description:
You really shouldn’t trust your eyes…and Squares proves it.
And make sure to turn the volume up!!

Squares is a game where you guide a red cube to the end of the level without falling. Sounds easy enough right? Not really. The camera changes every 7 seconds from top view to isometric view. So, those two blocks you though were close are not anymore!!

With amazing levels with a lot shapes, Squares will give your eyes a true test of depth perception, by using isometric illusions.

Squares has a really minimalistic design which lets you fully immerse into the game without any ornamental obstruction.

Squares is also one of the very first games on iOS to use the brand new Scene Kit API introduced in iOS 8!!
